original_text: Or let him take hold of my strength, that he may make peace with me; and he shall make peace with me.
korean_text: 그리하지 아니하면 내 힘을 의지하고 나와 화친하며 나와 화친할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Or let him take hold of my strength
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그가 나의 힘을 붙잡게 하라

sentences.original_text: that he may make peace with me
and he shall make peace with me
